definition: Germany/German/abbr. for 德國|德国[De2 guo2]
name of weed plant (fat hen, goosefoot, pigweed etc)/Chenopodium album
Serbia/Serbian/abbr. for 塞爾維亞|塞尔维亚[Sai1 er3 wei2 ya4]
to stop up/to squeeze in/to stuff/cork/stopper
to stop up/to stuff/to cope with

sentences.english: Theodore Dreiser is regarded as an outstanding representative of American naturalism.
sentences.chinese: 德萊塞被認爲是美國自然主義文學的傑出代表。

sentences.english: Dreiser's work is the truth of feeling, and of incident.
sentences.chinese: 德萊塞的作品是感情上的真實，加之情節也真實。

sentences.english: Dreiser's novels reveal a stream of pessimistic emotion.
sentences.chinese: 德萊塞的小說裏滲透着一股沉重的悲觀主義情緒。

sentences.english: Theodore Dreiser is one of the most influential American novelists during the f'ist half of the 20th century.
sentences.chinese: 德萊塞是二十世紀初美國最有影響力的小說家之一。
